comment: You can tell she is very passionate about music. She's lively and engaged in trying to make everyone understand the elements of music. I took her in a maymester. Lots of quizzes, but are all very easy. Most of them are done in class. Just have to be able to sit through it all. She doesn't care about the grade, she just hopes you learn. EASY A.

Take her for Maymester if you can!! Use the free trial on Norton website to access quizzes you'll save money! Amazing teacher and made the class as interesting as possible for those who don't care for music. highly recommend
Dr. Blackwell is one of the most passionate choir directors I have ever worked with. She is amazing, and always prepared!

Dr. Blackwell is beyond exceptional! The things she can do as a conductor are amazing, and she really energizes both performers and audience members. As a KSU student and member of the Women's Choir, I had the privilege of attending all her concerts and even sitting in on a couple classes. You will never regret taking her class!! She's spectacular!

Dr. Blackwell is beyond exceptional! The things she can do as a conductor are amazing, and she really energizes both performers and audience members. As a KSU student and member of the Women's Choir, I had the privilege of attending all her concerts and even sitting in on a couple classes. You will never regret taking her class!!

Absolutely Love Professor Blackwell. The sweetest woman you'll ever meet in Kennesaw. Although she has her sharp side.  I've always like too sing, but she just put a fire under that "like" and ignited something more. She's very inspirational and can easily be a role model for music majors.

I didnt have this class. I had a friend who took it and I sat in on all of their classes, however, Blackwell is so amazing that I still felt the need to post. She captures the entire chorus and brings the best out of everyone as a group and as individuals. Shes brilliant, funny, and full of a charisma that makes the class beyond enjoyable. 5 stars.
Amazing ensemble.  Amazing Teacher.  If you are a man and can sing, take this class.  You will not be disappointed,
Dr. Blackwell is an amazing professor.  She is so passionate and is awesome at connecting with her students.  One of the best professors I have ever had.

By far the best professor I've ever had at KSU!! Her passion for what she does is extremely inspiring & she wants to bring out the best in all her students! It is the class I look forward to the most & she is just absolutely AWESOME. She has inspired me to hopefully get another degree in choral music education one day. Take her!
I took her for multiple semesters of chorus. Absolutely love her, phenomenal teacher. Great director, and rather attractive ;)
Dr. Blackwell was extremely fun to work with. Although she does expect her students to do good work, she is so helpful in getting to that goal. Never a dull moment in that class!

Dr. Blackwell is an exceptional choral director. She is quite professional. Do not be intimidated if you want to sign up for a chorus class! It is a lot of fun, and she makes it completely worthwile! :)
She was absolutely awesome!  Class was never boring.  She has high expectations but is understanding and helpful!  I couldn't read a lick of music and now I can!
Dr. Blackwell is AWESOME! She is so funny, nice and fun! I am Shocked that she was not on here already! She Rocks!!
